meanings.definition: Resembling a shrimp in size or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The toy car was shrimpy compared to the real one.
meanings.sent2: The baby kitten looked shrimpy next to its mother.
meanings.sent3: The shrimpy flower pot was too tiny for the big plant.
meanings.sent4: The shrimpy house seemed lost among the tall buildings.
meanings.sent5: The shrimpy bird's nest was barely visible in the tree.

meanings.sent1: The shrimpy puppy could fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The shrimpy pebble was easily overlooked on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The shrimpy umbrella barely covered his head in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The shrimpy backpack looked comical on the tall man.
meanings.sent5: The shrimpy bookshelf held only a few tiny books.
